𝗜𝗡𝗗𝗘𝗫 | Autonomously performing complex tasks on the web  🔥 Super Hot!

⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐍 Python 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Autonomously performing complex tasks on the web
📅 Created: Nov 2024 • Updated: Apr 2025

⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Powered by reasoning LLMs with vision capabilities (Gemini 2.5 Pro, Claude 3.7 Sonnet, OpenAI o4-mini, Gemini 2.5 Flash)
✅ Installable via `pip install lmnr-index`
✅ Interactive CLI with `index run`
✅ Serverless API available
✅ Chat UI for interaction
✅ Advanced browser agent observability powered by Laminar


⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 2K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 94 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 4 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Index is an open-source browser agent that autonomously executes complex web-based tasks. It leverages reasoning LLMs with vision capabilities and offers various interfaces, including a CLI, serverless API, and Chat UI. The agent also provides advanced browser observability through integration with the Laminar platform.

⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/lmnr-ai/index

⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬⚬

𝗦𝗨𝗣𝗘𝗥𝗖𝗥𝗢𝗡𝗜𝗖 | Running cron jobs in containerized environments, particularly where standard cron implementations are ill-suited.  🔥 Super Hot!

✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 🐹 Go 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Running cron jobs in containerized environments, particularly where standard cron implementations are ill-suited.
📅 Created: Jul 2017 • Updated: Apr 2025

✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Crontab-compatible job runner
✅ Designed for container environments
✅ Environment variables are available in jobs
✅ Job output is logged to stdout/stderr
✅ Graceful shutdown on SIGTERM, SIGINT, and SIGQUIT
✅ SIGUSR2 triggers graceful shutdown and reloads crontab
✅ Supports second-resolution schedules


✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 2.1K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 124 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 28 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Supercronic is a crontab-compatible job runner specifically designed for container environments. It addresses the shortcomings of traditional cron implementations in containers by preserving environment variables, logging to stdout/stderr, handling signals gracefully, and supporting second-resolution schedules. It's ideal for anyone needing reliable cron job scheduling within containers.

✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/aptible/supercronic

✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦✦

𝗖𝗢𝗗𝗜𝗠𝗗 | Real-time collaborative markdown note-taking and documentation for teams and communities.  🌟 Rising Fast!

◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 📜 JavaScript 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Real-time collaborative markdown note-taking and documentation for teams and communities.
📅 Created: May 2015 • Updated: Apr 2025

◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Real-time collaborative markdown editing
✅ Open-source alternative to HackMD
✅ Customizable and self-hostable
✅ Supports various configuration options (networking, security, authentication, etc.)
✅ Migration guides from Etherpad


◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 9.6K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 1.1K 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 317 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

CodiMD is an open-source, self-hostable, real-time collaborative markdown editor. It allows multiple users to simultaneously edit and view markdown documents, making it ideal for team collaboration, documentation, and note-taking. CodiMD is based on HackMD and offers extensive customization options.

◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉◉

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/hackmdio/codimd

𝗙𝗟𝗔𝗧𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘𝗦 | Self-hosted, database-less note-taking  🔥 Super Hot!

▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫

𝗧𝗘𝗖𝗛 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗞: 💻 Vue 
🎯 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗖𝗔𝗦𝗘: Self-hosted, database-less note-taking
📅 Created: Aug 2021 • Updated: Apr 2025

▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫

✨ 𝗞𝗘𝗬 𝗙𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗨𝗥𝗘𝗦 ✨

✅ Mobile responsive web interface
✅ Raw/WYSIWYG markdown editor modes
✅ Advanced search functionality
✅ Note tagging functionality
✅ Customisable home page
✅ Wikilink support
✅ Light/dark themes
✅ Multiple authentication options
✅ Restful API


▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫

📊 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧 𝗦𝗧𝗔𝗧𝗦

⭐⭐⭐⭐ 2.1K 𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗿𝘀
🍴 119 𝗳𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀
🔍 83 𝗼𝗽𝗲𝗻 𝗶𝘀𝘀𝘂𝗲𝘀

▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫

📝 𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗧𝗛𝗜𝗦 𝗣𝗥𝗢𝗝𝗘𝗖𝗧

Flatnotes is a self-hosted, database-less note-taking web application that stores notes as markdown files. It offers features like advanced search, tagging, wikilinks, and multiple authentication options, aiming for a distraction-free note-taking experience with a clean and simple interface.

▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫▫

🔗 𝗟𝗜𝗡𝗞𝗦
• 𝗚𝗶𝘁𝗛𝘂𝗯: https://github.com/dullage/flatnotes
